titleStmt.title: Common-prayer-book no divine service, or, XXVIII reasons against forming and imposing any humane liturgies or Common-prayer-books, and the main objections to the contrary, answered also, the English Common-prayer-book anatomized, likewise twelve arguments against diocesan and lord-bishops, with the main objections answered, and the great disparity between them, and Timothy and Titus, shewed / by Vavasor Powell.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Livewell Chapman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
